marklogic.body: Dumb and Dumber. Stupid and Stupider. Creep and Creepier. Idiot and Idiotic. Midget and Dwarf. Dead Battery and Busted Carburetor. Bill and Ted. Cretin and Cretinous. Sterile and Flaccid. Dweeb and Nimrod. John and Client.Â Moron and Moronic. Obtuse and Deliberately Obtuse.Â Beavis and Butthead. Sinkhole and Black-hole. Pimple and Boil. Seamen and Puss. Pete and Repete. Puke and Vomit. Mouse and Mice. Train-wreck and Challenge Disaster.Â Simple and Simpleton. Yell and Scream. Blank and Void. Depression and Despair. What and Huh? Deaf and Dumb. Brainless and Headless. Was He There? and Where Is He? Dullard and Wienie. Moose and Mush.Â Asshat and Bald. Ren and Stimpy. Implosion and Fizzle. Fudge and Packer. Rumor and Missing. Over and Out.Â Â Â Â
